attributes.action: Allow small businesses to affordably submit R&D claims
attributes.additional_details: By making Box 99 of the R&D tax credit form CT600 only visible to registered agents (via the iXBRL tag), we the undersigned believe that HMRC currently prevents many small businesses from getting affordable access to this vital R&D support measure. We urge our political representatives throughout Parliament to make this mechanism genuinely accessible to all in order that it can properly support innovative small businesses.
